_from ,

_value ) internal {

(

)

[

;
require

[

]

[

] )

]

_from ,

bool
success )

(
_value
<=

[

][ msg.sender ] )
;
allowance
[

-=

;

(

success )

allowance
[ msg.sender ][

]=
_value

(

;

,

spender
.
receiveApproval
( msg.sender ,

,
address ( this ) ,
_extraData

;

true
;}
}

success )

require
(

;
balanceOf

( msg.sender ,
